item.consumable.key.name: Key
item.consumable.key.description: A skeleton key, capable of opening any of the locks within the liches dungeon. It seems some fault has caused far too many of these keys to be created, which serves you just fine. The magical property of the key gives it quite some value even outside the dungeon.
item.consumable.key.flavour: A flask a task a mask it's really all I ask.
